resources.string: This is a WorldChat Text Notification Channel.
VERSION 3.0.16 - Report bugs to https://git.io/fxenB, or type \'bug report\'
A new user has joined the chat!
Failed to send message (check your internet connection)
--- No internet detected, connect to internet and press send ---

Disclaimer: This app does not encrypt your messages or data in any way, other that what Android uses natively.

Use caution when using, and never share personal information via this app.

(The developer(s) of this app cannot be held responsible in any way for what you do with this program)

WorldChat (Global), a global communication program

 ScaleDrone Terms of Service: https://www.scaledrone.com/terms
 (Access this license anytime by typing 'license' in the chat!)

— Submitting a Bug Report —
 This program is open source and located at https://git.io/fxen4
 
 Issues can be submitted at https://git.io/fxenB or on Google Play.
 
 Please also read the disclaimer (shown on startup) before using!
To prevent spam, URLs are not allowed in messages.
Feature not implemented. See GitHub repo for more information.
Type \'license\' in message send box to view license.
Turns Developer Mode on or off.
